history.string: add policy IMS_CPFPolicy
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy description 'Policy for Change Proposal objects (Issue)'
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add type Issue
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add format all
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy store STORE
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add allstate public none none owner none none

mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy allstate revoke public none none filter '' remove revoke public all all revoke owner none none filter '' remove revoke owner all all public none none filter '' remove public all all owner none none filter '' remove owner all all
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy allstate public checkout checkout,read,show,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy allstate user 'Test Everything' all all
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add state Draft public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add state PreReview public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add state On_Hold_Ap public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add state Review public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add state Rejected_AP public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add state Rejected_RS public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add state Hold public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add state Accepted public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add state Cancelled public none none owner none none
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP promote false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP version false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP published false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP owner fromconnect fromconnect,read,show,toconnect
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP public read read,show,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_AP signature 1 branch Rejected_AP filter ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap promote true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap checkoutHistory true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap version false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap published false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap public read read,show,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap user IMS_AP_GenDesChangeManager checkin checkin,checkout,demote,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,promote,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state On_Hold_Ap signature PreReview branch PreReview filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review promote true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review checkoutHistory true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review version false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review published false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review owner fromconnect fromconnect,read,show,toconnect,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review user IMS_AP_GenDesChangeManager checkin checkin,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,modifyform,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review user IMS_RS_SupplierChangeManager checkin checkin,checkout,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,modifyform,promote,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review add trigger promote action emxTriggerManager input 'IMS_CreateChangeRequest IMS_PolicyCPFPolicyPromoteAction'
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review signature ToAccepted branch Accepted filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review signature ToHold branch Hold filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review signature ToPreReview branch PreReview filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Review signature ToRejectedRS branch Rejected_RS filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted promote false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted version false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted published false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted owner fromconnect fromconnect,read,show,toconnect,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted public read read,show,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted user IMS_RS_SupplierChangeManager all all
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Accepted signature 3 branch Accepted filter ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_RS !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_RS promote false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_RS checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_RS version false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_RS action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_RS check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_RS majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_RS minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_RS published false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Rejected_RS signature 2 branch Rejected_RS filter ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft promote true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft checkoutHistory true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft version false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft published false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft owner all all
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft public read read,show,viewform

mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft user 'Project User' fromconnect fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,toconnect,todisconnect filter context.user.assignment[IMS_*_GenDesChangeManager]&&(context.user.object[Person].to[Employee].from.name==owner.object[Person].to[Employee].from.name)
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft add trigger promote override emxTriggerManager input IMS_PolicyCPFPolicyPromoteAction
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft signature ToCancelled branch Cancelled filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Draft signature ToPreReview branch PreReview filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Cancelled !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Cancelled promote false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Cancelled checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Cancelled version false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Cancelled action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Cancelled check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Cancelled majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Cancelled minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Cancelled published false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Cancelled public checkout checkout,read,show,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview promote true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview version false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview published false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview owner checkin checkin,checkout,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview public read read,show,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview user IMS_AP_GenDesChangeManager checkin checkin,checkout,demote,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,modifyform,promote,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview user IMS_AP_GenDesChiefEngineer promote promote
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview user IMS_TITAN_GenDesChangeManager checkin checkin,checkout,fromconnect,fromdisconnect,modify,promote,read,show,toconnect,todisconnect,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview add trigger approve check emxTriggerManager input IMS_PolicyCPFStateReviewPromoteCheck
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview add trigger promote override emxTriggerManager input IMS_PolicyCPFPolicyPromoteAction
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview signature On_Hold_Ap branch On_Hold_Ap filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview signature ToDraft branch Draft filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview signature ToRejectedAP branch Rejected_AP filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state PreReview signature ToReview branch Review filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold !enforcereserveaccess
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold promote true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold checkoutHistory false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold version false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold action '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold check '' input ''
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold majorrevision true
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold minorrevision false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold published false
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold public read read,show,viewform
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold user IMS_RS_SupplierChangeManager promote promote
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold add trigger promote action emxTriggerManager input 'IMS_CreateChangeRequest IMS_PolicyCPFPolicyPromoteAction'
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold signature ToAccepted branch Accepted filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy state Hold signature ToReview branch Review filter '' add approve Employee
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property state_Rejected_AP value Rejected_AP
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property state_On_Hold_Ap value On_Hold_Ap
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property state_Review value Review
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property state_Accepted value Accepted
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property state_Rejected_RS value Rejected_RS
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property state_Draft value Draft
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property state_Cancelled value Cancelled
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property state_PreReview value PreReview
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property state_Hold value Hold
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property 'MxUpdate Sub Path'
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property application value Unknown
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property author value 'The MxUpdate Team'
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property 'file date' value '07-08-2019 08:55:17.829'
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property 'installed date' value 07-10-2019
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property installer value 'The MxUpdate Team'
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property 'original name' value IMS_CPFPolicy
mod policy IMS_CPFPolicy add property version
